content: उपरम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (Sometimes <ab>A.</ab> also) {@--1@} To cease, end, terminate; संगतावुपरराम च लज्जा <ls>Ki. 9. 44</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">13. 69</ls>; इत्युक्त्वोपरराम; युद्धमुपारमत् ceased &c. {@--2@} To cease or desist from, stop (<ab>oft.</ab> with pres. part.); व्यापादयन्नोपरराम <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; or with <ab>abl.</ab>; <ls>Bg. 2. 35</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 54</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">9. 51</ls>; or with <ab>inf.</ab>; <ls>Ki. 4. 17</ls>; or by itself; <ls>Bk. 8. 55.</ls> {@--3@} To be quiet or calm; यत्रोपरमते चित्तं <ls>Bg. 6. 20.</ls> {@--4@} To a wait, wait for. {@--5@} To make quiet (= {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%}) {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to cease, stop, make quiet or still.
